USAGE_NOTES.description: This file maps logical image names to actual image file paths.

categories.featured: Featured category images shown on homepage
categories.menuItems: Individual menu item images (keyed by menu item ID)

howToUpdate: 1. To change an image, update the 'path' field to point to the new image file
2. Always update the 'alt' text to describe the new image for accessibility
3. Keep the 'description' field updated for internal reference
4. Image paths should start with '/images/' and point to files in the public or images directory
howToAddNewImage: 1. Add your image file to the /images/ directory
2. Choose the appropriate category (hero, featured, menuItems, about)
3. Add a new entry with: path, alt text, and description
4. If it's a menu item image, use the menu item's ID as the key
